title: T206 Raw Lot of 7 for $70!  SOLD!
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: T206 Raw Lot of 7 for $70!  SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Price reduced to $10/card.  Back damage on these; price includes delivery; paypal preferred.  See scans below:

Frank Bowerman - Sovereign 150 (shellacked?)
Bill Bradley (Portrait)
Bill Chappelle
Larry Doyle (With Bat)
Harry McIntyre (Brooklyn)
George Stone
George Stovall (Portrait)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/raw/6869/back-damage-12[/IMG]

Seriously, you can't get 'em any cheaper.  Includes the rare Bradley-Leibold variation :D
